overview: We cross the seas of memory and absence to tell the story of Emilia and Yeyé, two of the 49 children who died at the ABC day-care in an evitable fire that reflected the terrible consequences of corruption and influence peddling surrounding the government subrogated day-care system in Mexico. This documentary is a tribute to these children’s memory and to their parents decision to take up their life again.
title: The Naptime
